page.title: 16COCKFIGHTING AT EARDINGTON
page.content:
In the lonely and peaceful county of shropshire, a Terrier show was supposedly taking place at{Little Moor {Ridding kennels,}just outside Bridgnorth.
A tipoff was given to the police and the RSPCA from an anonymous phonecall letting it be known that{ {cockfighting,}an illegal sport, was going to take place at the kennels.
The event was already taking place when police closed in. Participants tried to escape, leaving their cars behind and fleeing across fields. Police removed the ignition keys and the registrations were traced. The people who were involved were intervieued and one man{arrested.}The} court case is due soon. {* * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
